shared.model.map

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.map.GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that represents the map of the game. It knows where all the hexes are and what their number chits are. It knows where all the harbors and edges and vertexes are and who has built on them. It is mostly a container class.

    • Constructor Summary
